description:
webOS is dead.  Or, is it?  Can HP pull it back from the brink?  Will the beloved Palm brand be salvaged from the wastebin?

Only time will tell, and this app tells you the elapsed time since the last instant this wonderful mobile operating system was declared "dead."

Every time you launch this app, it pings a remote server to acknowledge that YOUR device is alive and well.  Future versions will allow you to view these metrics and add other features... but only as long as YOU keep your webOS device running.

So download today, and stare death in the face.  We just might win!
versionNote:
- Exhibition Mode support
- Device check-ins no longer require manually starting the app
- UI improvements
